title: Observance of holidays falling on Sundays and Saturdays
context: §8-2 Observance of holidays falling on Sundays and Saturdays. If any of the State&rsquo;s legal holidays fall on Sunday, the following Monday shall be observed as a holiday. If the day falls on Saturday, the preceding Friday shall be observed as a holiday. [L 1923, c 151, §1; RL 1925, pt of §146; RL 1935, pt of §21; am L 1941, c 132, pt of §1; am L 1953, c 274, pt of §10; RL 1955, pt of §1-43; am L 1961, c 116, pt of §1; HRS §8-2; am L 1968, c 39, §2; am L 1969, c 156, §2; am L 1976, c 54, §1] Attorney General Opinions When a national holiday falls on Saturday, the Saturday and preceding Friday are considered holidays. Att. Gen. Op. 64-1.
